location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter discusses administrative and financial matters and reports the arrival of the Eagle Snow. It states that the Vakeel (referring to Karim Khan) has ordered the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] to return the Bushire merchant's property that was taken in August 1777 and discusses other regional developments in brief.
